An apology of an appeale Also an epistle to the true-hearted nobility. By Henry Burton, pastor of St. Mathewes Friday-Street. Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
[8], 32 p.
Printed, [by J.F. Stam], [Amsterdam] : anno Dom. 1636.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC. The first leaf is blank. In this edition the last page, line 2 up, has "throne". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
